topic: Questions concerning lampcolor and file links
body:
Hi Everyone:
I’m learning Radiance through the book with two questions about Tutorial One. 
1) I’m wondering how to quit lampcolor after finishing the calculation. 
2) About creating the leaves, the terminal gives me the feedback below for all the xform. I do put leaf_1.rad and leaves_1.rad under the same directory. Is there a solution to solve it? 
oconv: warning - (!xform -n 2b -ry 20 -mx -rz -100 -ry 20 -s .15 -t 0 .04 0 leaf_1.rad): empty file
xform: cannot find file "leaf_1.rad"
oconv: warning - (!xform -n 3a -ry 25 -rz -65 -ry 0 -s .14 -t 0 .06 0 leaf_1.rad): empty file


Thanks in advance.
___
<sup>Automatically generated content from [radiance mailing-list](https://radiance-online.org/pipermail/radiance-general/2015-June/011065.html).</sup>
